citation: Proclamation under the Corrections (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Corrections (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2016

I, the Lieutenant-Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Corrections (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2016 fix 1 December 2017 as the day on which Part 3 of that Act commences.

20 November 2017

A. M. BLOW

Lieutenant-Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Corrections

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 November 2017
